migrations.description: Replace implicitDependencies with namedInputs + target inputs
migrations.name: 15.0.0-migrate-to-inputs

migrations.description: Prefix outputs with {workspaceRoot}/{projectRoot} if needed
migrations.name: 15.0.0-prefix-outputs

migrations.description: Set project names in project.json files
migrations.name: 15.1.0-set-project-names

migrations.description: Update any references of MFE to MF.
migrations.name: migrate-mfe-to-mf

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~14.1.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-14-1-0

migrations.description: Update the rxjs package version to ~7.5.0 if RxJS 7 is used in workspace.
migrations.name: update-rxjs-7-5-0

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~14.2.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-14-2-0

migrations.description: Rename @nrwl/angular:webpack-server executor to @nrwl/angular:webpack-dev-server
migrations.name: rename-webpack-server-executor

migrations.description: Update the usages of @nrwl/angular/testing to import jasmine-marbles symbols from jasmine-marbles itself.
migrations.name: switch-to-jasmine-marbles

migrations.description: Stop hashing karma spec files and config files for build targets and dependent tasks
migrations.name: add-karma-inputs

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~15.0.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-15-0-0

migrations.description: Remove browserlist config as it's handled by build-angular
migrations.name: remove-browserlist-config

migrations.description: Update typescript target to ES2022
migrations.name: update-typescript-target

migrations.description: Remove bundleDependencies from server targets
migrations.name: update-workspace-config

migrations.description: Remove exported `@angular/platform-server` `renderModule` method. The `renderModule` method is now exported by the Angular CLI.
migrations.name: update-platform-server-exports

migrations.description: Remove no longer needed require calls in Karma builder main file.
migrations.name: update-karma-main-file

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~15.1.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-15-1-0

migrations.description: Since Angular v15, the `RouterLink` contains the logic of the `RouterLinkWithHref` directive. This migration replaces all `RouterLinkWithHref` references with `RouterLink`.
migrations.name: migration-v15-router-link-with-href

migrations.description: In Angular version 15, the deprecated `relativeLinkResolution` config parameter of the Router is removed. This migration removes all `relativeLinkResolution` fields from the Router config objects.
migrations.name: migration-v15-relative-link-resolution

migrations.description: Updates the Angular Material to v15
migrations.name: migration-v15

migrations.description: Updates the Angular CDK to v15
migrations.name: migration-v15

migrations.description: Adds @typescript-eslint/utils as a dev dep
migrations.name: experimental-to-utils-deps

migrations.description: Switch from  @typescript-eslint/experimental-utils to @typescript-eslint/utils in all rules and rules.spec files
migrations.name: experimental-to-utils-rules

migrations.description: Stop hashing eslint config files for build targets and dependent tasks
migrations.name: add-eslint-inputs

migrations.description: Migrates from @nrwl/workspace:run-commands to nx:run-commands
migrations.name: 14-8-0-change-run-commands-executor
